reference.shortdesc: Key words are terms that apply to the topic or map.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The content of the keywords element can be used to optimize the rendered output:

ul.li: Processors might add metadata to the output format to facilitate search engine optimization.
Processors might use the content of indexterm elements to generate an index for a document.

section.p: While the keyword element can be used inline, the keywords element is not an inline element. The keywords element only appears in the topicmeta or prolog, and it is used to specify keywords that apply to the topic.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: All keyword and indexterm elements contained in the keywords element are considered part of the topic or map metadata. How the content of these elements is processed depends on the output medium.
